text: This block is used to terminate or continue a loop, and can be placed anywhere within a loop block. Clicking on “break out” gives you two options: break out (terminates the loop), or continue with iteration (the loop is repeated).
1. In the below example the loop is terminated in case "x" is "False" erven though only one iteration is done
2. In the below example the loop jumps to the next iteration without executing below block in case if "x" is "False"
